REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f5964 reute d f BC-E-SYSTEMS-<ESY>-GETS 03-17 0038

TEXT.TITLE: E-SYSTEMS <ESY> GETS NAVY CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: E-Systems Inc said it has received a three-year U.S. Navy contract worth 9,208,223 dlrs for the continued production of AN/UGC-136 military teleprinters for use in submarines. Reuter
